\subsection{Function Documentation}
\index{internal\_\-group@{internal\_\-group}!gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname@{gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname}}
\index{gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname@{gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname}!internal_group@{internal\_\-group}}
\subsubsection[{gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}char$\ast$ gfal\_\-get\_\-hostname (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const char $\ast$}]{ path, }
\item[{char $\ast$}]{ errbuf, }
\item[{int}]{ errbufsz}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\label{group__internal__group_gac0a6270bb801ae2016977a038121d79f}
extract a hostname from a SURL. We search for \char`\"{}://\char`\"{} to get the start of the hostname. Then we keep going to the next slash, colon or end of the SURL.
